title: Memory Test
description: A simple memory test game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Can you remember which words you've seen before and which you haven't? Inspired by the Human Benchmark.

title: To Do List
description: A simple to do list app built with React. Includes features like adding, deleting, and marking tasks as completed, as well as local storage functionality.

title: Odin Calculator
description: A simple calculator app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Includes features like adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing. Made for The Odin Project.
